org.springframework.jmx.export

Interface MBeanExporterListener


  • public interface MBeanExporterListener
    A listener that allows application code to be notified when an MBean is registered and unregistered via an MBeanExporter.
    Since:
    1.2.2
    Author:
    Rob Harrop
    See Also:
    MBeanExporter.setListeners(org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExporterListener[])

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mbeanRegistered(ObjectName objectName)
      Called by MBeanExporter after an MBean has been successfully registered with an MBeanServer.
      void mbeanUnregistered(ObjectName objectName)
      Called by MBeanExporter after an MBean has been successfully unregistered from an MBeanServer.

    • Method Detail

      • mbeanRegistered

        void mbeanRegistered(ObjectName objectName)
        Called by MBeanExporter after an MBean has been successfully registered with an MBeanServer.
        Parameters:
        objectName - the ObjectName of the registered MBean

      • mbeanUnregistered

        void mbeanUnregistered(ObjectName objectName)
        Called by MBeanExporter after an MBean has been successfully unregistered from an MBeanServer.
        Parameters:
        objectName - the ObjectName of the unregistered MBean
